name: @lukovio/wskit
description: A collection of JavaScript utilities for common tasks in web development.

scripts.jekyll-build-incremental: yarn copy-library-to-site && bundle exec jekyll build --source ./ --destination dist --config _config.yml --incremental
scripts.jekyll-serve: yarn copy-library-to-site && bundle exec jekyll serve --port 8080 --source ./ --destination dist --config _config.yml -w
scripts.jekyll-build: yarn copy-library-to-site && bundle exec jekyll build --source ./ --destination dist --config _config.yml

author: lukov.io/IktaNikuba
